entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Buffalo Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 10:47 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
